title: Post-Implementation Health Check
description: One month after a project go-live, a consultant performs a health check to ensure the system is being used effectively.

tasks.description: Review the customer's usage analytics since go-live.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant finds that user adoption is high, but a key feature is being ignored.

tasks.description: Analyze the system configuration for any potential optimizations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant identifies a workflow that could be simplified.

tasks.description: Prepare a health check report for the customer with recommendations for improving adoption and optimizing their configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant provides a valuable, proactive report to the customer.
